name: Pixie (itch) (StevenLM)
description:
Pixie is a cute looking platformer game. It was made during the 2021 Secret santa game jam. The main goal is to save the more mini pixies you can and reach the end of the game through  ennemies and other stuff.

This game has been realized during the secret santa Game Jam, hosted by Sheepolution, 01010111 and Kya and I hoped you'll like it.
